title: DAY IN MY LIFE AT THE FARM! Part 1

tasks.task: Morning routine and cat and dog care.
subtasks: Wake up and prepare for the day.
Feed and interact with cats (Delilah and Benelli).

tasks.task: Unload and transport materials to the farm.
subtasks: Transfer supplies from vehicles to the farm.
Check on baby bunnies and attempt to capture one.
Take in and care for stray dogs.

tasks.task: Continue farm tasks and plan for the remainder of the day.
subtasks: Address broken boards for horse stalls.
Plan future tasks for the day.
